name: Ornith
declaringWar: Well, How delicious is your MEAT?
attacked: I'll skewer you and tear into pieces!
defeated: Your people's flesh was savory. Next time I'll have yours at any cost.
introduction: Welcome. I'm 'Shrike', just a small innocent gourmet.
tradeRequest: You want some? I hope you like it.
